Item ID6571

An uncut onyx is the second rarest gem in RuneScape, behind zenyte, and is used in the Crafting skill. Cutting this gem requires 67 Crafting, granting 167.5 Crafting experience. This makes a cut onyx, which can be used to make very powerful jewellery. The cut onyx can also be used with a zenyte shard to create an uncut zenyte.

It can be purchased from TzHaar-Hur-Lek's Ore and Gem Store for 300,000 Tokkul (or 260,000 with the Karamja gloves 1 or better). A common method to obtain this Tokkul as an Ironman involves selling chaos runes to TzHaar-Mej-Roh's Rune Store; this requires approximately 29,000 chaos runes when using the Karamja gloves 1 or better.

There is also an extremely small chance of getting it from a bag full of gems. Each bag has 40 gems with each individual one having a 1/100,000,000 chance of being an onyx, making the chance per bag approximately 1/2,500,000.[1]
